entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,862Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 24

Summary: In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words.Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,089,329Chapters: 36/?Kudos: 52

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,310Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 99

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "
